page.title: 12Marsworth First School
page.content: Marsworth School is constantly under closure threat .It is Voluntary Aided ,partly supported by the Church of England_maintain buildings.Bucks C.C._ Teachers,meals,supplies,funds, secretary,equipment.At September 1985 Govenors rose from 7 to 14 appointed by Church,parents,local authority to advise. Children 5 to 8 years in two classes.September 1985_21 Pupils .9_12 Brookmead,Ivinghoe. Marsworth Headmistress and another teacher for half a day a week relies heavily on voluntary help from members of the community.The children are taught reading,writing ,arthmetic, basic geography,history,music, nature study and religious education. They go swimming once a week,cook,have nature outings. Television,radio help teach.Governors give a Bible to all leavers.
